snippet.title: Kapih | Game | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam 👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3337060/kapih
Wishlist on Epic 👉 https://store.epicgames.com/p/kapih-8f686a

Kapih is a thrilling retro-inspired 2D run-and-gun action platformer that combines tight, responsive controls, 8-direction shooting, and epic boss battles with local co-op for twice the fun. Set against a vibrant reimagination of ancient India, Kapih invites you to step into the shoes of a brave Vaanar (monkey) warrior.

Journey through lush, hand-crafted levels and experience the untold story inspired by the legendary Ramayana—one of South East Asia’s greatest epics. What begins as an ordinary life is soon swept into a whirlwind of extraordinary events, shaping your hero’s destiny with every leap, shot, and battle.

Kapih blends nostalgia with fresh storytelling, featuring stunning culturally rich art, beautifully animated CG cutscenes, and an immersive narrative that pulls you into a world where mythology and action collide. Grab a friend and team up as Vaanar and his loyal companion Bindu in the local co-op mode to face relentless foes, follow the leadership of Hanuman, and uncover the deeper purpose behind their quest.

Get ready to relive the golden age of gaming—with a distinctly Indian soul.

Kapih is coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox in 2025

➡ https://www.instagram.com/kapihgame
➡ https://twitter.com/kapihgame
➡ https://discord.com/invite/Xxrqx85Gfv

➡ Game Site: https://kapih.game/
➡ Developers: https://88games.in/
